name: Times Turn
description:
Use your mouse or controller to carefully navigate these 2D abstract environments with a little ball. 

This is the first game made by two people, so please support us by trying this game and telling us if you like it!

There are about 9 more levels planned for the full release, including cheats / powerups and some fun NPCs!

To play the game, simply download, unzip, and run "TimesTurn.exe". We recommend using a controller if you have access to it.

Please remember this is still a work in progress and all feedback is appreciated!

Have Fun!
